27/*
28 * $FreeBSD: head/cddl/compat/opensolaris/misc/thread_pool_impl.h 265689 2014-05-08 16:59:36Z mav $
29 */
30
31#ifndef _THREAD_POOL_IMPL_H
32#define _THREAD_POOL_IMPL_H
33
34#pragma ident "%Z%%M% %I% %E% SMI"
35
36#include <thread_pool.h>
37
38#ifdef __cplusplus
39extern "C" {
40#endif
41
42/*
43 * Thread pool implementation definitions.
44 * See <thread_pool.h> for interface declarations.
45 */
46
47/*
48 * FIFO queued job
49 */
50typedef struct tpool_job tpool_job_t;
51struct tpool_job {
52 tpool_job_t *tpj_next; /* list of jobs */
53 void (*tpj_func)(void *); /* function to call */
54 void *tpj_arg; /* its argument */
55};
56
57/*
58 * List of active threads, linked through their stacks.
59 */
60typedef struct tpool_active tpool_active_t;
61struct tpool_active {
62 tpool_active_t *tpa_next; /* list of active threads */
63 pthread_t tpa_tid; /* active thread id */
64};
65
66/*
67 * The thread pool.
68 */
69struct tpool {
70 tpool_t *tp_forw; /* circular list of all thread pools */
71 tpool_t *tp_back;
72 mutex_t tp_mutex; /* protects the pool data */
73 cond_t tp_busycv; /* synchronization in tpool_dispatch */
74 cond_t tp_workcv; /* synchronization with workers */
75 cond_t tp_waitcv; /* synchronization in tpool_wait() */
76 tpool_active_t *tp_active; /* threads performing work */
77 tpool_job_t *tp_head; /* FIFO job queue */
78 tpool_job_t *tp_tail;
79 pthread_attr_t tp_attr; /* attributes of the workers */
80 int tp_flags; /* see below */
81 uint_t tp_linger; /* seconds before idle workers exit */
82 int tp_njobs; /* number of jobs in job queue */
83 int tp_minimum; /* minimum number of worker threads */
84 int tp_maximum; /* maximum number of worker threads */
85 int tp_current; /* current number of worker threads */
86 int tp_idle; /* number of idle workers */
87};
88
89/* tp_flags */
90#define TP_WAIT 0x01 /* waiting in tpool_wait() */
91#define TP_SUSPEND 0x02 /* pool is being suspended */
92#define TP_DESTROY 0x04 /* pool is being destroyed */
93#define TP_ABANDON 0x08 /* pool is abandoned (auto-destroy) */
94
95#ifdef __cplusplus
96}
97#endif
98
99#endif /* _THREAD_POOL_IMPL_H */
100
